modName: Clintsters Granite Alchemy Workbench Work Station Retexture
summary: A detailed retexture of the Alchemy workbench and work station. in black granite
descriptionHtml:
Name: Clintsters Granite Alchemy Workbench/Work Station Retexture
Version: 1.0
Category: Textures
Author: Clintster74
===============================================
Update: to V 1.1
I was a little unhappy with my first retexture of the Alchemy table so I went back to the drawing board and tried some new tricks in photo shop and came up with this. The red highlights are much cleaner and there is not as much contrast in the granite 
=============================================== 
Description:
A detailed retexture of the Alchemy workbench and work station. 
===============================================
Installation:
Unpack the sip file to folder of your choice, copy the texture folder to your Skyrim data folder and allow for overwrite.
================================================
Uninstall:
Delete the file “alchemyworkbench01” from your Skyrim data/textures/clutter folder
================================================
Thanks to:
Bond123 for testing and input
Bethesda for the game
Nexus and of the staff for providing the best place to post and down load mods
=================================================
Tools used:
Photosopt CS5
Nifscope
================================================
Legal and licensing:
My textures are free to use in your mods without farther permission.
You may not up load my textures to other sits.
You must credit me for my work
author: Clintster74
